title: Yaary - Book Auto, Cab & Metro
description:
Discover Convenience and Affordability with Our Yaary - Online Auto & Taxi Booking Services in India

In the hustle and bustle of daily life, finding a reliable and affordable transportation option can be a challenge. However, with our - Yaary - online taxi & auto booking services, your commute is just a click away. Whether you need to hire a taxi nearby or book a ride to another city in India, we've got you covered.

Our motivation behind building Yaary - Online Ride App was to develop an app that drivers think of as their own, a platform where they receive the support that they need in order to be more than delighted to provide customers with a smooth, hassle-free riding experience. 

Built on the Government of India’s Open Network for Digital (ONDC) protocol, Yaary provides drivers with ownership and control by enabling them with technology at a low cost and zero commission model. As a Yaary - ride booking app customer, you can expect quick rides at fair prices. 


Why Choose Our Auto & Taxi Booking Services?

Convenience at Your Fingertips: With our user-friendly app, you can hire a auto nearby or book cabs online effortlessly. The power to arrange your commute is now in the palm of your hands.

Best Price Guarantee: We understand the value of your money. That's why we offer cabs at the lowest fare, ensuring you get the most cost-effective transportation solution for your needs.

Safety First: Your well-being is our priority. Book a safe taxi with us, and rest assured that you are in reliable hands. Our commitment to safety sets us apart in the world of online cab booking.

Outstation Cabs: Need a ride to another city in India? No problem! Book outstation cabs with us and experience a seamless journey to your desired destination.

India's Best Ride App: Explore the joy of a quick ride with large taxi app. Zip through traffic and reach your destination in no time.

Trusted Services: Yaary takes pride in being a trusted name in the online taxi booking industry. Count on us for reliable and safe cabs, wherever your journey takes you.

Fair Pricing: All prices are set as per government regulations, so you don't have to worry about not getting the right fare. No haggling. No waste of time.

Zero Commission: Yaary does not charge you extra for services provided.

Direct Payment: You can pay your driver directly in cash or UPI.

यारी ಯಾರಿ யாரி యారీ യാരി ୟାରି یاری ਯਾਰੀ

summary: Find driver nearby! Request a ride - Book taxi, auto & book cabs online
recentChanges:
Ah, the sound of silence! 🤫 In a world where ringing phones induce panic, there's one thing the young generation can agree on: talking over the phone? No, thank you! 🙅‍♂️📞

Introducing chat option to converse with your drivers. Now, we know what you're thinking: "Chatting with drivers? It's been there for ages 🤷‍♀️

We know that too. But we gotta hype it up. 😛
comments: I downloaded the app from the play store, but I was very disappointed with its performance. The app is not working properly at all. Every time I open the app, it keeps loading to get my current location, even though I have turned on the location GPS. This is very frustrating and annoying. I think the app developers should fix this bug as soon as possible, or else I will uninstall the app and give it a one-star rating

Kudos to the yaary app team . Overall great experience using this app although i noticed some issues using the app which i hope gets fixed asap - 1. Driver location is not accurate 2.Ride fare before and after the ride isn't same 3. Map shows incorrect directions 4. Change the vehicle icon for better visibility Apart from this i'll suggest to keep an option for the user to give his own ride fare price before booking a ride

This app is a disappointment. It's very bad, charging extra fees beyond the estimated price. Moreover, the customer service is painfully slow, making problem resolution a frustrating experience. Overall, I do not recommend this app.

Please do not force to turn on GPS signal. Try asking 2-3 times post which let users manually enter pickup and drop locations. Turning ON GPS drains away battery and all other apps like Ola/Uber/Rapido do not force users to turn on GPS to book a ride. Hence please implement the same.

Great work. We need your app, this service. Problems I had after installing the app, (you guys would be working on this): it not taking the destination location, also when I zooming to pin the location it is skipping a bit, after pining location it's only waiting and not proceeding... My mobile is Moto e4 plus
